metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20185 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: It was found in Moodle before version 3.10.1, 3.9.4, 3.8.7 and 3.5.16 thatmessaging did not impose a character limit when sending messages, whichcould result in client-side (browser) denial of service for users receivingvery large messages.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
